title: James Corden to Leave ‘The Late Late Show’ Next Year
sub_head: ‘I never want this show to overstay its welcome in any way,’ he said in emotional monologue on show he has hosted since 2015
body:
Late-show host James Corden announced in an emotional monologue that he is leaving “The Late Late Show” next year.
Mr. Corden, who has hosted the CBS program since 2015, said during a taping of the show Thursday that he is renewing his contract only through next year.
